name: Narfex
description: Narfex, achieved excellent results in the progress of P2P fiat exchange and community adaptation to the DeFi space. Moreover, the team gonna create the p2p fiat exchange algorithms into smart contracts, and make the process community driven. This innovation could change the fiat to crypto exchange process in whole the market, as anyone could create pools and get the benefits of fiat exchanges on he’s currency troth our protocol. To achive our goals we have launched our utility token Narfex, to start build the community to provide more liquidity, we’re launching and adopt to our ecosystem, we created an interesting functionalities on our utility token and also made it DAO.
